column7: Run of the mill Chinese place
column9: A poorly lit place housing an average Western style Chinese restaurant. The menu, ranging from fish and squab to pork and duck, includes all the dishes you‚Äôd expect from a Chinese joint. It‚Äôs not bad, it‚Äôs not spectacular, it‚Äôs definitely greasy and it‚Äôs floating in...More
For Chinese food in Lund this is the best one. A huge huge menu but the dishes are very similar. Friendly staff

We ordered online. The food was smashed when arriving 20min late. We got food made from frozen vegetables, prefabricated spring rolls that were badly spiced. Consistency of the sauce and shrimps was thick and glue-ish. We were terrible disappointed, expecting something that would match the...More
Very nice place for dinner, with good quality to price ratio. Staff is very comfortable and frendly.

The food is average, you might find one or two items on the enormous menu that you like but most of it tastes the same because they're made with the same stuff. There's a lot of MSG in there as well. Still there's not a...More

I came once with my wife to this ugly restaurant and we ordered one plate for her because I was full. The waiter came again and ask if we gonna share the plate or not we said yes. Then he said you cannot order one...More
Something very special. One of the must have in Lund. Very special and delicious.This is a Tatung specialty and is really  worth it.

Tatung resataurant is a great lace our family has been coming to for many years. the staff are very nice and always greeting you with a smile. The food is served just the way you wih, always in the right order and everyone gets their...More

column7: Your nice no-fancy chineese restaurant in neighbourhood
column9:
Was at the Tatung restaurant multipe times, with colleagues. Great service, spacious restaurant and decent spread of menu!

The restaurant is willing to customize dishes a bit as per your wishes, which is great and not so common in this part of the world.

The only thing that was okay in this restaurant was the size of the portions. But the food was poor. My wife had Peking Duck that was fried in some sort of batter. It was very fat.  My fried pork was hardly any better, not...More

While in Lund I was fighting a cold and ended up stopping at this restaurant for some hot and sour soup 'therapy'. Good location near the Grand hotel, extensive menu, moderate prices, friendly service and good bottled beer.
Food was nice, but we would have liked more options on the menu (spicy options as well). Our daughter said her dish was one of the best she ever had.

Both times I have been here (with family and as a couple) I have had a fantastic experience. The waiters were lovely, though sometimes too friendly and making awkward convo haha. I can't speak for the individual dishes but we all bought the 100kr meal...More

Lots on the menu, so there's something for everyone here. Portions are generous. Prices are good - even the alcohol! The house white was about 170SEK a bottle, and it was fine. This is not somewhere for fine dining, but it's good value. Would be...More

Not a pleasant experience. The Peking duck was battered and deep-fried. The fried rice was oily and tasted like it had been fried in the oil from the deep fat frier (after removing the Peking duck). The non-fried dishes were bland and tasteless. The only...More
Hungry? You have come to the right place. I loved it as a student and yesterday i brought my kids. They just loved the food.

Have only tried the lunch but it really does not taste anything. The food is cheap and you get a lot of food but it would still not recommend this place. There are better places in Lund where you can eat for the same price.
A nice restaurant with good tasty asian food near the train station in Lund. Many different dishes to choose from. They have lunch and a la carte with more expensive dishes. Free rice refills.

column7: Nice staff, shame about the food
column9: Friendly staff, prompt service but the food was probably the worst Chinese food I have had in a long time. The fact our kids didn't eat much is very telling as they are permanently hungry teenagers.Change the cook!
Do avoid this place.
